message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $102. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $108.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum price, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $105. Can you meet me at that price?
